products.name: Pico 4 128GB
products.summary: Pico 4 128GB is a virtual reality headset developed by ByteDance.
products.description: The Pico 4 is a cutting-edge virtual reality (VR) headset developed by ByteDance. This device was announced on September 22, 2022, and released to the public on October 18, 20221. It’s specifically designed for virtual reality games and is currently available only in Europe and East Asia, including China, South Korea, Japan, Malaysia, and Singapore2./n/nOne of the standout features of the Pico 4 is its hardware. It’s lightweight and durable, making it comfortable for extended use. Additionally, it features full color, low latency pass-through video, which enhances the immersive nature of the VR experience./n/nThe Pico 4 also boasts a high-resolution display, providing crisp, clear visuals that bring virtual environments to life in stunning detail. This, combined with its powerful hardware, ensures a smooth, lag-free performance, even in graphically intensive VR applications./n/nIn addition to its impressive hardware, the Pico 4 also offers a range of unique gaming experiences. From personal training sessions, boxing, table tennis, tennis, badminton, bowling, fishing, and more, the Pico 4 provides new opportunities to meet and connect with others in VR. The Pico 4 also integrates the proprietary CalSense physical fitness monitoring algorithm, which calculates calorie consumption as you exercise, in real time./n/nFurthermore, the Pico 4 offers improved tracking and positioning for the headset and controllers, making every VR movement swift and decisive. This is made possible with proprietary omni-directional SLAM, infrared optical positioning system, and upgraded optical sensors./n/nThe Pico 4 also supports real-time contact with online friends and allows you to share your VR perspective to personal TikToks with one click. It also supports MRC recording, which allows you to record and share your point of view in the virtual world with close friends.

products.name: Meta Quest 3 128GB
products.summary: Meta Quest 3 is a virtual reality headset developed by Meta.
products.description:
The Meta Quest 3 is a state-of-the-art virtual reality (VR) headset developed by Reality Labs, a division of Meta Platforms. This device represents a significant leap forward in VR technology, offering an immersive and interactive experience that pushes the boundaries of what’s possible in virtual spaces.

 Unveiled on June 1, 2023, and released to the public on October 10, 2023, the Meta Quest 3 has quickly become a favorite among VR enthusiasts. Its design incorporates elements from the Quest Pro, resulting in a thinner form factor that enhances comfort during extended use. The headset also includes additional sensors that improve tracking accuracy, providing a more seamless and intuitive user experience./n/nOne of the standout features of the Meta Quest 3 is its display. The headset uses a pair of high-resolution LCD displays, each offering a per-eye resolution of 2064×2208. This results in crisp, clear visuals that bring virtual environments to life in stunning detail./n/nPowering the Meta Quest 3 is the Qualcomm Snapdragon, a high-performance processor designed for mobile devices. This ensures smooth, lag-free performance, even in graphically intensive VR applications. Whether you’re exploring virtual worlds, playing games, or interacting with others in VR, the Meta Quest 3 delivers a consistently high-quality experience./n/nIn addition to its impressive hardware, the Meta Quest 3 also benefits from Meta’s expansive VR ecosystem. Users have access to a wide range of apps and games, from immersive social experiences to cutting-edge educational applications. With ongoing support and regular updates, the Meta Quest 3 continues to evolve and improve, offering users new ways to explore, learn, and connect in VR.

products.name: Meta Quest 2 128GB
products.summary: Meta Quest 2 is a virtual reality headset developed by Meta.
products.description: The Meta Quest 2 is an advanced all-in-one virtual reality (VR) headset developed by Reality Labs, a division of Meta Platforms. This device is designed to provide a range of experiences, from gaming and entertainment to social interaction and even PCVR capabilities./n/nOne of the key features of the Meta Quest 2 is its standalone nature. Unlike many other VR headsets, it doesn’t require pairing with an expensive PC. This makes it a more accessible option for those looking to dive into the world of virtual reality./n/nThe Meta Quest 2 comes with a faster processor and higher resolution compared to its predecessor. It’s powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon XR2 Gen 23, which ensures smooth, lag-free performance, even in graphically intensive VR applications./n/nThe headset uses high-resolution displays to provide crisp, clear visuals that bring virtual environments to life in stunning detail. This enhances the immersive nature of the VR experience, making it feel as though you’re truly a part of the virtual world./n/nIn addition to its impressive hardware, the Meta Quest 2 also offers a range of unique social experiences. From multiplayer games to joining up with friends at a live show or instructor-led workout, Meta Quest 2 provides new opportunities to meet and connect with others in VR.

products.name: Skytech Gaming Nebula Gaming PC Desktop – Intel Core i5 13400F 2.5 GHz, NVIDIA RTX 4060, 1TB NVME SSD, 16GB DDR4 RAM 3200, 600W Gold PSU, 11AC Wi-Fi, Windows 11 Home 64-bit,Black
products.summary: Take your game to the next level. Skytech's Nebula lets you play with higher settings, faster frame rates and more powerful multi-tasking capabilities than standard gaming PCs. Featuring more power to game and stream simultaneously with no lag, a Skytech Nebula gives gamers even more power to back up your team mates and create better content.
products.description:
Why settle for mediocrity? Leap forward into the Skytech Nebula series with the newest architectures. Featuring the latest NVIDIA RTX series graphics cards and is powered by INTEL Core i5 Processor. The Skytech Nebula delivers the best price-to-performance value gaming rig in the market.

The Skytech Nebula offers the best gaming computer built up to date to quickly run popular games such as Call of Duty Warzone, Fortnite, Escape from Tarkov, Grand Theft Auto V, Valorant, World of Warcraft, League of Legends, Apex Legends, Roblox, PLAYERUNKNOWN's Battlegrounds, Overwatch 2, Counter-Strike 2, Battlefield V, New World, Minecraft, Elden Ring, Rocket League, Baldur's Gate 3, Dota 2, HELLDIVERS 2, Monster Hunter, Palworld, Terraria, Rainbow Six Siege, Dragon's Dogma 2, and more at Ultra settings, detailed 1080p Full HD resolution, and smooth 60+ FPS gameplay.

SPECIFICATIONS

Processor: INTEL Core i5 13400F 2.5 GHz (4.6GHz Max Boost) CPU

products.name: Acer Nitro 17 Gaming Laptop AMD Ryzen 7 7840HS Octa-Core CPU 17.3' FHD 165Hz IPS Display NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4050 16GB DDR5 1TB SSD Wi-Fi 6E RGB Backlit KB AN17-41-R6L9
products.summary:
Brand	acer
Model Name	Nitro 17
Screen Size	17.3 Inches
Color	Black
Hard Disk Size	1 TB
CPU Model	AMD Ryzen 7
Ram Memory Installed Size	16 GB
Operating System	Windows 11 Home
Special Feature	Backlit Keyboard, Memory Card Slot
Graphics Card Description	Dedicated
products.description:
Go full throttle with the Acer Nitro 17 gaming laptop featuring the latest AMD Ryzen 7000 Series Processors and NVIDIA’s DLSS 3 technology – whether playing casually or ranking up online. The picture-perfect 17.3-inch FHD display with 165Hz refresh rates provides an immersive viewing experience while next-gen cooling, a 4-zone RGB keyboard and NitroSense software let you take command of the playing field.
AMD Ryzen 7000 Series: Now featuring the AMD Ryzen 7 7840HS Octa-Core Processor delivering superior gaming performance where you need it most. With Precision Boost, get up to 5.1GHz for your high-demand games.
AMD Ryzen AI: Present your best self with AI-enhanced video chat. Get a laptop that’s AI ready.
Beyond Fast: The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4050 Laptop GPU is beyond fast for gamers and creators. They're powered by the ultra-efficient NVIDIA Ada Lovelace architecture which delivers a quantum leap in both performance and AI-powered graphics. With the included MUX switch, you can disable the integrated graphics for an increase in gaming performance.
Bask in Visual Glory: With a lightning-quick 165Hz refresh rate, the 17.3' Full HD (1920 x 1080) display makes your game sessions fluid, unbroken, and unmatched. Now you can land those reflexive shots with pinpoint accuracy and minimal ghosting.
Internal Specifications: 16GB DDR5 Memory; 1TB PCIe Gen 4 SSD; Wireless Wi-Fi 6E supports dual-stream Wi-Fi in the 2.4GHz, 5GHz and 6GHz bands, including 2x2 MU-MIMO Technology; Killer Ethernet E2600 10/100/1000; Bluetooth 5.1
Complete Next-Gen Cooling: The newly refined chassis has a few extra tricks up its sleeve when it comes to cooling with dual-fan, dual-intakes (top and bottom), and a quad-exhaust port design. This also includes the chilling effects of liquid metal thermal grease which acts as a more efficient heat transfer between the CPU and the heatsink.
The Keys to Victory: Spice things up with the 4-zone RGB keyboard and take command of the inner workings of the laptop via the dedicated NitroSense Key. With the NitroSense utility app, you can control fan speeds, lighting, and more to push performance to its max.
Max Your Speeds with Wi-Fi 6E: Get an edge online by taking control of your network and prioritizing your gameplay with Killer Ethernet E2600 and Wi-Fi 6E. Plug all your peripherals into the full range of ports, including HDMI 2.1, USB Type-C Port - supporting USB4 and the newest USB 3.2 standard with Gen 2 support. There’s even a MicroSD Card Reader should it be needed.
Ports For All Your Accessories: 1 - USB Type-C Port - supporting USB4 (up to 40 Gbps), USB Charging & Power Delivery (Up to 65W), 1 - USB Type-C Port USB 3.2 Gen 2 (up to 10 Gbps) DisplayPort over USB Type-C, & USB Charging & Power Delivery (Up to 65W), 2 - USB 3.2 Gen 2 Ports (One Featuring Power-off Charging), 1 - USB 2.0 Port, 1 - HDMI 2.1 Port with HDCP Support, 1 - Ethernet (RJ-45) Port, 1 - Headphone/Microphone-in Jack
